title: A ring of cohomological operators on Ext and Tor
abstract:
Let $f \colon R \to B$ be a surjective homomorphism of rings with kernel $I$.
Gulliksen (when $I$ is generated by a regular sequence) and later Mehta (in
general) showed that for any $B$-modules $M$ and $N$,
$\mathrm{Ext}_B^{\ast}(M,N)$ has a structure of graded
$\mathrm{S}_B^{\ast}\left(\widehat{I/I^2}\right)$-module, where
$\widehat{\quad}$ denotes dual and $\mathrm{S}$ denotes symmetric algebra. This
construction is extended to the case where $f$ is not necessarily surjective in
a way that allows one to regard these operators from a more natural
perspective.
